basicInfo.productName: The name of your product. Recommend to have 20-40 words with unique selling points, so that your products will appear in search result 6x higher.
basicInfo.category: Please make sure to upload product images(s), fill product name, and select the correct category to publish a product.
basicInfo.media.productImages: Product images are the main images of your item. For some cases and categories, you can also upload variant level image below on Price & Stock section.Click to view item image usage
basicInfo.media.buyerPromotionImage: A buyer promotion image represents your product in various places, such as search result page, product recommendation page, etc. Having a buyer promotion image will inspire buyers to click on your product.
basicInfo.media.productVideo: Please make sure to upload product images(s), fill product name, and select the correct category to publish a product.
productDetails.pricing.current: Sales Price for a Product for Promotion. The rate of the special price to the price must be between 0.05 and 1.00
productDetails.pricing.original: This is the price, that the customer has to pay for the product. This price includes the taxes. The price is separated with a point delimiter
productDetails.stock: Please make sure to upload product images(s), fill product name, and select the correct category to publish a product.
productDetails.availability: Please make sure to upload product images(s), fill product name, and select the correct category to publish a product.
productDetails.freeItems: *Only if applicable* Free merchandise, free items, free products, free gifts, free accessories or advertising gifts that come along with the package.
productDetails.sku: Identifier for a product provieded by the Seller. Product is mandatory for Seller, even when the column Mandaroy says something different.
productDetails.variations: Type and press enter to create, or just to quickly select standard values
specifications.brand.name: Brand of the product Search your brand by typing a keyword. If your brand is not on the list, please Submit New Brand
description.main: The product description should give the customer useful information about the product to ensure a purchase.
description.highlights: Enter a minimum of three short highlights of the product to make the purchase decision easier for the customer. Please format as a bulleted list.
description.tags: Indicates the items that customer will get when they receive this product. For example, for a smartphone, a customer may get: 1 x Phone, 1 x Cable, 1 x Headset
description.whatsInBox: Indicates the items that customer will get when they receive this product. For example, for a smartphone, a customer may get: 1 x Phone, 1 x Cable, 1 x Headset
shipping.packageWeight: Weight and packaging size: Please fill in the weight including packaging. Inaccurate information will results in extra shipping costs and failed shipping.
shipping.dimensions.length: Please fill in the logistics size accurately to avoid the loss of freight caused by filling in the wrong.
shipping.dimensions.width: Please fill in the logistics size accurately to avoid the loss of freight caused by filling in the wrong.
shipping.dimensions.height: Please fill in the logistics size accurately to avoid the loss of freight caused by filling in the wrong.
shipping.dangerousGoods: Please indicate if your product contains battery, liquid or other dangerous components so as to ensure smooth logistics process, multiple selection is available.
shipping.warranty.type: For Warranty Type 1. No Warranty: Select this if the product does not have a warranty 2. Brand Warranty: Select this if Warranty is offered by the Brand. for e.g Apple in the case of a new Iphone 3. Seller Warranty: Select this if Warranty is offered by the seller, and not the brand. for e.g in the case of a refurbished Iphone without Apple Warranty
shipping.warranty.period: Please select a warranty duration for your product.
shipping.warranty.policy: Please provide more details about your warranty policy such as documentation required, warranty locations/address, etc.
